title: How To Mount Aconcagua: A Mostly Serious Guide to Climbing the Tallest Mountain Outside the Himalayas
description: Considering an Aconcagua climb? This efficient book includes a hilarious day by day account with detailed descriptions of the challenges facing a climber on Aconcagua, such as when to wear your Crocs, which pop music divas to enjoy, and the challenges of pooping at high altitude. Everything you need to know about what it's like to attempt to summit Aconcagua is inside, served up on a tasty bed of humor. Join the author in taking on the adventure of a lifetime without taking it too seriously.
author: Jim  Hodgson
